ygData.subject: RE: Bard BOTB
ygData.msgSnippet: Haha Shada, you always were one for dueling though :).  I know you would have given Thott some fun.  Given his equipment and his skill, I had confidence Thott
ygData.messageBody:
Haha Shada, you always were one for dueling though :). I know you would have
given Thott some fun. Given his equipment and his skill, I had confidence
Thott would beat everyone. And will beat everyone...

I have never been a PvP person, and going into a battle I am sure to lose just
makes it less appealing.

Often it's amazing fun to try things much harder than your current known level.
But that's against non-sentient opponents.

And apart from all the other reasons, I have to work. The schedule didn't even
allow for me to go and watch.

I made the point in another post that BotB rewards those already 'winning' the
game even more. I wonder how satisfying it is for those people.

Mara

P.S. 6 blue to go for 60 - PAIN
P.P.S. WOOT on Hobben hehe


> I never mentioned the botb, he asked what bards like thott wear and I
> gave him a short answer. I even gave you a tell (was someone using you
> for tracking as it turns out) asking why you weren't there. It is for
> fun, it sounds like if you perceive the contest this way you may even
> perceive the game this way, no longer worth the effort. If I was still
> around, I would have joined KNOWING ABSOLUTELY that I would lose, cause
> I would have had fun trying (and probably would still be 59 even though
> it would be 4 months after i hit it hehe).
>
> I was the only person in the arena at 2:00pm when Thott logged on there
> and we grouped and talked for a couple hours up to the event. He even
> admitted that he could have the best equipment in the game and lose if
> he couldn't play worth a damn. The fact is, regardless of having the
> best equipment of any bard in the game, he is an extraordinary player,
> in PvP as well.
>
> Then I (49 monk now) killed my old rival Hobben, the co-leader of AL,
> with a couple wizards I recruited which made the whole day worthwhile!
>
> Shada/Erisi
